Johnnie Walker Princes Street

Short Narrative, Commercial   

Advertising campaign for the Johnnie Walker Princes Street Experience. About half the shots were on motion control, so we operated with a two-camera setup: One on sticks/slider, and one on a Bolt Jr+ provided by MRMC.

Short Narrative, Commercial

We created a wide variety of deliverables, for use on social media and on physical mediums, such as digital billboards across Edinburgh. This is the 30sec 16x9, used on social media.
